verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁמִינִ֔י <S%H8066><s%> And it came to pass on the eighth קָרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> called מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> [that] Moses לְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron וּלְבָנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons וּלְזִקְנֵ֖י <S%H2205><s%> and the elders יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> Take לְ֠ךָ עֵ֣גֶל <S%H5695><s%> calf בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted בָּקָ֧ר <S%H1241><s%> bull לְחַטָּ֛את <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering וְאַ֥יִל <S%H352><s%> and a ram לְעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt offering תְּמִימִ֑ם <S%H8549><s%> without blemish וְהַקְרֵ֖ב <S%H7126><s%> and offer לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> [them] before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> then בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel תְּדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> thou shalt speak לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying קְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> Take שְׂעִיר־ <S%H8163><s%> ye a kid עִזִּים֙ <S%H5795><s%> of the goats לְחַטָּ֔את <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering וְעֵ֨גֶל <S%H5695><s%> and a calf וָכֶ֧בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> and a lamb בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> [both] of the first שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> year תְּמִימִ֖ם <S%H8549><s%> without blemish לְעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt offering

וְשׁ֨וֹר <S%H7794><s%> Also a bullock וָאַ֜יִל <S%H352><s%> and a ram לִשְׁלָמִ֗ים <S%H8002><s%> for peace offerings לִזְבֹּ֙חַ֙ <S%H2076><s%> to sacrifice לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וּמִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> and a meat offering בְּלוּלָ֣ה <S%H1101><s%> mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> for to day יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD נִרְאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> will appear אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיִּקְח֗וּ <S%H3947><s%> And they brought אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> [that] which Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וַֽיִּקְרְבוּ֙ <S%H7126><s%> drew near כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and the whole הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> and all the congregation וַיַּֽעַמְד֖וּ <S%H5975><s%> and stood לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses זֶ֧ה <S%H2088><s%> This הַדָּבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> that ye should do וְיֵרָ֥א <S%H7200><s%> shall appear אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> about כְּב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and the glory יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron קְרַ֤ב <S%H7126><s%> Go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> unto the altar וַעֲשֵׂ֞ה <S%H6213><s%> and offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַטָּֽאתְךָ֙ <S%H2403><s%> thy sin offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹ֣לָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H5930><s%> and thy burnt offering וְכַפֵּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> and make an atonement בַּֽעַדְךָ֖ <S%H1157><s%> about וּבְעַ֣ד <S%H1157><s%> and for הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> for thyself and for the people וַעֲשֵׂ֞ה <S%H6213><s%> and offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָרְבַּ֤ן <S%H7133><s%> the offering הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> of the people וְכַפֵּ֣ר <S%H3722><s%> and make an atonement בַּֽעֲדָ֔ם <S%H1157><s%> about כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> for them as the LORD

וַיִּקְרַ֥ב <S%H7126><s%> therefore went אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> unto the altar וַיִּשְׁחַ֛ט <S%H7819><s%> and slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵ֥גֶל <S%H5695><s%> the calf הַחַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> of the sin offering אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which לֽוֹ׃

וַ֠יַּקְרִבוּ <S%H7126><s%> brought בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּם֮ <S%H1818><s%> the blood אֵלָיו֒ <S%H413><s%> to him וַיִּטְבֹּ֤ל <S%H2881><s%> unto him and he dipped אֶצְבָּעוֹ֙ <S%H676><s%> his finger בַּדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> in the blood וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on קַרְנ֣וֹת <S%H7161><s%> [it] upon the horns הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> out the blood יָצַ֔ק <S%H3332><s%> and poured אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at יְס֖וֹד <S%H3247><s%> at the bottom הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֵ֨לֶב <S%H2459><s%> But the fat וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכְּלָיֹ֜ת <S%H3629><s%> and the kidneys וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיֹּתֶ֤רֶת <S%H3508><s%> and the caul מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> above הַכָּבֵד֙ <S%H3516><s%> the liver מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַ֣חַטָּ֔את <S%H2403><s%> of the sin offering הִקְטִ֖יר <S%H6999><s%> he burnt הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חָה <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> And the flesh וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָע֑וֹר <S%H5785><s%> and the hide שָׂרַ֣ף <S%H8313><s%> he burnt בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> the camp

וַיִּשְׁחַ֖ט <S%H7819><s%> And he slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹלָ֑ה <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offering וַ֠יַּמְצִאוּ <S%H4672><s%> presented בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> sons אַהֲרֹ֤ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron's אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> unto him the blood וַיִּזְרְקֵ֥הוּ <S%H2236><s%> which he sprinkled עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹלָ֗ה <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offering הִמְצִ֧יאוּ <S%H4672><s%> And they presented אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> to him לִנְתָחֶ֖יהָ <S%H5409><s%> unto him with the pieces וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרֹ֑אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> thereof and the head וַיַּקְטֵ֖ר <S%H6999><s%> and he burnt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> [them] upon the altar

וַיִּרְחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> And he did wash אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקֶּ֖רֶב <S%H7130><s%> the inwards וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכְּרָעָ֑יִם <S%H3767><s%> and the legs וַיַּקְטֵ֥ר <S%H6999><s%> and burnt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> [them] upon the burnt offering הַמִּזְבֵּֽחָה׃ <S%H4196><s%> on the altar

וַיַּקְרֵ֕ב <S%H7126><s%> And he brought אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> קָרְבַּ֣ן <S%H7133><s%> offering הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> the people's וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׂעִ֤יר <S%H8163><s%> the goat הַֽחַטָּאת֙ <S%H2403><s%> which [was] the sin offering אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> for the people וַיִּשְׁחָטֵ֥הוּ <S%H7819><s%> and slew וַֽיְחַטְּאֵ֖הוּ <S%H2398><s%> it and offered it for sin כָּרִאשֽׁוֹן׃ <S%H7223><s%> as the first
וַיַּקְרֵ֖ב <S%H7126><s%> And he brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹלָ֑ה <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offering וַֽיַּעֲשֶׂ֖הָ <S%H6213><s%> and offered כַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> it according to the manner

וַיַּקְרֵב֮ <S%H7126><s%> And he brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּנְחָה֒ <S%H4503><s%> the meat offering וַיְמַלֵּ֤א <S%H4390><s%> and took כַפּוֹ֙ <S%H3709><s%> an handful מִמֶּ֔נָּה <S%H4480><s%> some וַיַּקְטֵ֖ר <S%H6999><s%> thereof and burnt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> [it] upon the altar מִלְּבַ֖ד <S%H905><s%> beside עֹלַ֥ת <S%H5930><s%> the burnt sacrifice הַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> of the morning

וַיִּשְׁחַ֤ט <S%H7819><s%> He slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשּׁוֹר֙ <S%H7794><s%> also the bullock וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַ֔יִל <S%H352><s%> and the ram זֶ֥בַח <S%H2077><s%> [for] a sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִ֖ים <S%H8002><s%> of peace offerings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> which [was] for the people וַ֠יַּמְצִאוּ <S%H4672><s%> presented בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> sons אַהֲרֹ֤ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron's אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּם֙ <S%H1818><s%> unto him the blood אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him וַיִּזְרְקֵ֥הוּ <S%H2236><s%> which he sprinkled עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲלָבִ֖ים <S%H2459><s%> And the fat מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשּׁ֑וֹר <S%H7794><s%> of the bullock וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> and from הָאַ֔יִל <S%H352><s%> and of the ram הָֽאַלְיָ֤ה <S%H451><s%> the rump וְהַֽמְכַסֶּה֙ <S%H4374><s%> and that which covereth וְהַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <S%H3629><s%> [the inwards] and the kidneys וְיֹתֶ֖רֶת <S%H3508><s%> and the caul הַכָּבֵֽד׃ <S%H3516><s%> [above] the liver

וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> And they put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲלָבִ֖ים <S%H2459><s%> the fat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הֶחָז֑וֹת <S%H2373><s%> upon the breasts וַיַּקְטֵ֥ר <S%H6999><s%> and he burnt הַחֲלָבִ֖ים <S%H2459><s%> the fat הַמִּזְבֵּֽחָה׃ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar

וְאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> הֶחָז֗וֹת <S%H2373><s%> And the breasts וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> שׁ֣וֹק <S%H7785><s%> shoulder הַיָּמִ֔ין <S%H3225><s%> and the right הֵנִ֧יף <S%H5130><s%> waved אַהֲרֹ֛ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron תְּנוּפָ֖ה <S%H8573><s%> [for] a wave offering לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> as Moses

וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> lifted up אַהֲרֹ֧ן <S%H175><s%> And Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [יָדֹו כ] (יָדָ֛יו <S%H3027><s%> able ק) אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> toward the people וַֽיְבָרְכֵ֑ם <S%H1288><s%> and blessed וַיֵּ֗רֶד <S%H3381><s%> them and came down מֵעֲשֹׂ֧ת <S%H6213><s%> from offering הַֽחַטָּ֛את <S%H2403><s%> of the sin offering וְהָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> and the burnt offering וְהַשְּׁלָמִֽים׃ <S%H8002><s%> and peace offerings

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> went מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> and Aaron אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> into the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וַיֵּ֣צְא֔וּ <S%H3318><s%> and came out וַֽיְבָרֲכ֖וּ <S%H1288><s%> and blessed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וַיֵּרָ֥א <S%H7200><s%> appeared כְבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> and the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> unto all the people

וַתֵּ֤צֵא <S%H3318><s%> And there came אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> a fire מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> out from before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַתֹּ֙אכַל֙ <S%H398><s%> and consumed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲלָבִ֑ים <S%H2459><s%> and the fat וַיַּ֤רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> [which] when all the people וַיָּרֹ֔נּוּ <S%H7442><s%> they shouted וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> and fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> on their faces
